mapper.insert: insert into tb1_board (title, content, writer) values (#{title},#{content},#{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb1_board where bno = #{bno}
mapper.update: update tb1_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb1_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb1_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tb1_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
